name: Professional Karate Gi - 10oz
description: High-quality 10oz karate gi, perfect for training and competition. Made from durable cotton blend, preshrunk for a consistent fit. Includes jacket, trousers, and white belt.
availability: In Stock. Dispatched from and sold by Amazon.
features: Includes jacket, trousers, and white belt
detailedFeatures: **BUILT TO LAST:** Constructed from a 10oz cotton-polyester blend, this gi is designed to withstand rigorous training sessions while remaining comfortable and breathable.
**OPTIMAL FIT:** Our fabric is pre-washed and pre-shrunk, ensuring that the fit you get out of the bag is the fit it will maintain for its lifetime.
**REINFORCED FOR STRENGTH:** High-stress areas like the collar, seams, and cuffs are heavily reinforced with extra stitching to prevent tears and rips.
**TRADITIONAL DESIGN:** A classic cut provides a traditional look and feel, allowing for a full range of motion for kicks, strikes, and stances.

name: Boxing Gloves - 16oz Training
description: Premium 16oz boxing gloves designed for sparring and heavy bag workouts. Multi-layered foam padding for superior hand protection. Velcro wrist closure for a secure fit.
detailedFeatures: **PREMIUM SYNTHETIC LEATHER:** High-quality synthetic leather construction provides excellent durability and performance, making these gloves long-lasting and easy to clean.
**MULTI-LAYER FOAM PADDING:** Conforms to the natural shape of your fist for comfortable and safe impact absorption during intense training.
**SECURE WRIST CLOSURE:** A full-wrap strap with a hook-and-loop closure ensures a secure, non-slip fit, providing essential wrist support.
**BREATHABLE MESH PALM:** The EverCool mesh palm design increases ventilation, keeping your hands cool and dry during long workouts.

name: Focus Mitts - Curved Design
description: Durable curved focus mitts for precision striking drills. Lightweight design with comfortable hand compartment. Ideal for boxing, Muay Thai, and MMA training.
detailedFeatures: **SHOCK ABSORBENT:** Made with high-density, shock-absorbing foam to handle the most powerful punches and protect the trainer.
**ERGONOMIC DESIGN:** A pre-curved shape provides a comfortable and natural fit for the trainer's hands, reducing fatigue.
**SECURE FIT:** Features a secure hook-and-loop wrist strap for a snug fit, ensuring the mitts stay in place during training.

name: Mouthguard - Adult & Youth
description: Boil-and-bite mouthguard for superior dental protection. Suitable for all contact sports. Includes protective case.
detailedFeatures: **CUSTOM FIT:** Boil-and-bite design provides a comfortable, custom fit for maximum protection.
**DENTAL PROTECTION:** Heavy-duty Exoskeletal Shock Frame provides ultimate full mouth protection during impacts.
**VERSATILE USE:** Suitable for all contact sports including boxing, MMA, rugby, and hockey.

name: Heavy Punching Bag - 4ft
description: 4ft heavy-duty punching bag, unfilled. Made from durable synthetic leather with reinforced straps. Includes chains and swivel for hanging.
detailedFeatures: **DURABLE CONSTRUCTION:** Built from high-quality synthetic leather, designed to withstand intense workouts and last for years.
**VERSATILE TRAINING:** Perfect for boxing, kickboxing, and MMA, allowing you to practice a wide range of strikes and combinations.
**EASY TO HANG:** Comes with heavy-duty chains and a swivel for secure and easy installation in your home gym or training space.

name: Judo Gi - Single Weave
description: Traditional single weave judo gi suitable for beginners and intermediate practitioners. 100% cotton for comfort and durability.
detailedFeatures: **TRADITIONAL JUDO GI:** Designed for both beginners and intermediate judokas, offering a balance of comfort and durability.
**100% COTTON:** Made from high-quality 100% cotton for a soft feel and excellent breathability during training.
**REINFORCED STITCHING:** Features reinforced stitching at key stress points to ensure longevity and withstand rigorous grappling.

name: MMA Sparring Gloves - 7oz
description: 7oz MMA sparring gloves with open palm design for grappling. Padded thumb and knuckle protection for safe training.
detailedFeatures: **OPTIMAL FOR MMA:** 7oz padding provides excellent protection for striking while the open palm design allows for effective grappling and transitions.
**ENHANCED PROTECTION:** Features padded thumb and knuckle areas to minimize injury risk during sparring sessions.
**SECURE & COMFORTABLE:** An adjustable hook-and-loop wrist strap ensures a snug and secure fit, preventing slippage during intense workouts.

name: Shin Guards - Instep Protection
description: Protective shin guards with integrated instep padding. Ideal for Muay Thai, kickboxing, and MMA sparring.
detailedFeatures: **SUPERIOR PROTECTION:** Constructed with high-density foam to absorb impact effectively, protecting your shins and insteps during sparring.
**ERGONOMIC DESIGN:** Lightweight and contoured to fit the natural shape of your leg, ensuring maximum comfort and minimal shifting.
**SECURE FIT:** Features two hook-and-loop straps and an elastic foot strap for a secure, non-slip fit, allowing for unrestricted movement.

name: BJJ Gi - Lightweight Pearl Weave
description: Lightweight pearl weave BJJ gi, perfect for competition and warm weather training. Ripstop trousers for durability.
detailedFeatures: **LIGHTWEIGHT & DURABLE:** Made with a 450gsm pearl weave jacket and 10oz ripstop trousers, offering a perfect balance of lightness for competition and durability for daily training.
**OPTIMAL FOR COMPETITION:** Designed with a competition legal cut, ensuring compliance with most BJJ federation rules.
**COMFORTABLE FIT:** Pre-shrunk fabric provides a consistent fit, and the minimalist branding offers a clean, professional look.

name: Hand Wraps - 180 inch
description: 180-inch Mexican style hand wraps for boxing and MMA. Semi-elastic cotton blend for a secure, comfortable fit.
detailedFeatures: **SUPERIOR HAND PROTECTION:** 180-inch length provides ample coverage for knuckles, wrists, and hands, crucial for preventing injuries during training.
**COMFORTABLE & SECURE:** Made from a semi-elastic cotton blend that conforms to your hand, offering a snug and comfortable fit under boxing gloves.
**EASY TO USE:** Features a thumb loop for easy starting and a strong hook-and-loop closure to keep wraps securely in place.

name: Speed Bag - Leather
description: High-quality leather speed bag for improving hand-eye coordination and rhythm. Double-stitched seams for durability.
features: Ideal for speed and accuracy training
detailedFeatures: **PREMIUM LEATHER:** Constructed from genuine leather for superior durability and a classic feel, designed to withstand countless strikes.
**ENHANCED DURABILITY:** Features double-stitched seams for increased longevity, ensuring the bag holds up to rigorous training.
**IMPROVE SKILLS:** Excellent for developing hand-eye coordination, rhythm, and speed, essential for boxing and martial arts practitioners.

name: Karate Belt - Black
description: Premium black belt for martial arts practitioners. 100% cotton, 1.75 inches wide, with 10 rows of stitching for durability.
detailedFeatures: **PREMIUM QUALITY:** A high-quality black belt made from 100% cotton, signifying dedication and achievement in martial arts.
**DURABLE CONSTRUCTION:** Features 10 rows of precise stitching for enhanced durability and a crisp, professional appearance.
**TRADITIONAL DESIGN:** Designed to meet the standards of traditional martial arts, suitable for both training and formal events.

name: Thai Pads - Curved
description: Curved Muay Thai pads for powerful striking drills. Multi-layered foam padding with reinforced handles and straps.
detailedFeatures: **PROFESSIONAL GRADE:** Made from genuine leather, these curved Muay Thai pads are built for professional training and durability.
**OPTIMAL SHOCK ABSORPTION:** Multi-layered foam padding effectively absorbs heavy impacts, protecting both the striker and the holder.
**SECURE & COMFORTABLE:** Features reinforced handles and two hook-and-loop arm straps for a secure, comfortable grip and stability during intense drills.

name: Head Guard - Open Face
description: Open-face head guard for sparring. Provides excellent visibility and protection for the head and ears. Adjustable chin strap.
detailedFeatures: **MAXIMUM PROTECTION:** Features high-density foam padding to protect the head and ears from impacts during sparring.
**UNOBSTRUCTED VISION:** Open-face design ensures excellent peripheral vision, crucial for effective sparring.
**SECURE & COMFORTABLE:** An adjustable chin strap and lace-up top provide a secure and customizable fit for various head sizes.

name: Speed Rope - Adjustable
description: Adjustable speed rope with comfortable handles for cardio and footwork training. Lightweight and durable.
detailedFeatures: **CUSTOMIZABLE LENGTH:** Easily adjustable to suit users of all heights, ensuring optimal performance for cardio and footwork drills.
**COMFORTABLE GRIP:** Ergonomically designed handles provide a comfortable and secure grip, reducing hand fatigue during long sessions.
**SMOOTH & FAST:** High-quality bearings ensure a smooth and fast rotation, perfect for improving speed, agility, and coordination.

name: Karate Mitts - WKF Approved
description: WKF approved karate mitts for competition and training. Ergonomic design with elastic wrist strap for a secure fit.
detailedFeatures: **WKF APPROVED:** Officially approved by the World Karate Federation for use in competitions, ensuring compliance with safety standards.
**ERGONOMIC FIT:** Designed to conform to the natural shape of the hand, providing maximum comfort and protection without hindering movement.
**SECURE & STABLE:** Features an elastic wrist strap for a secure and snug fit, preventing the mitts from slipping during intense kumite.

name: Grappling Dummy - 70lb
description: 70lb grappling dummy for BJJ and MMA training. Durable synthetic leather construction, ideal for throws, submissions, and ground work.
detailedFeatures: **REALISTIC TRAINING:** Designed to simulate a human opponent, perfect for practicing throws, takedowns, submissions, and ground control in BJJ and MMA.
**HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION:** Made from durable synthetic leather with reinforced stitching to withstand rigorous training sessions.
**VERSATILE USE:** Suitable for solo training, allowing athletes to refine techniques and build strength without a partner.

name: Wooden Katana - Training Sword
description: Traditional wooden katana (bokken) for martial arts training. Made from durable hardwood, perfect for forms and light sparring.
detailedFeatures: **AUTHENTIC TRAINING TOOL:** A traditional wooden katana (bokken) designed for martial arts practice, including forms, drills, and light sparring.
**DURABLE HARDWOOD:** Made from high-quality hardwood for excellent durability and a realistic feel, ensuring longevity.
**SAFE PRACTICE:** Provides a safe alternative to live blades for practicing sword techniques, suitable for both beginners and experienced practitioners.

name: Kickboxing Shorts - Muay Thai
description: Authentic Muay Thai kickboxing shorts. Lightweight satin material with wide elastic waistband for comfort and freedom of movement.
detailedFeatures: **AUTHENTIC MUAY THAI:** Designed for kickboxing and Muay Thai, these shorts offer the traditional style and functionality required for the sport.
**UNRESTRICTED MOVEMENT:** Made from lightweight satin material with high side slits, ensuring maximum comfort and freedom of movement for kicks and knees.
**DURABLE & COMFORTABLE:** Features a wide elastic waistband for a secure and comfortable fit, built to withstand rigorous training sessions.

name: Wrist Wraps - Heavy Duty
description: Heavy-duty wrist wraps for weightlifting, boxing, and martial arts. Provides strong wrist support to prevent injury.
detailedFeatures: **MAXIMUM WRIST SUPPORT:** Heavy-duty elastic cotton provides strong support to the wrists, crucial for preventing injuries during weightlifting, boxing, and martial arts.
**SECURE & ADJUSTABLE:** Features a thumb loop for easy starting and a strong hook-and-loop closure for a secure and customizable fit.
**ENHANCED PERFORMANCE:** Helps stabilize the wrists, allowing you to lift heavier, punch harder, and train with greater confidence.

name: Karate Head Protector - WKF Approved
description: WKF approved head protector for karate kumite. Lightweight and comfortable with clear visibility. Designed for maximum safety.

**LIGHTWEIGHT & COMFORTABLE:** Designed for maximum comfort and minimal bulk, allowing for unrestricted movement during sparring.
**OPTIMAL VISIBILITY:** Open-face design provides clear peripheral vision, crucial for reacting quickly in kumite.

name: Punching Bag Stand - Heavy Duty
description: Heavy-duty punching bag stand. Freestanding design, easy to assemble. Supports bags up to 100lbs.
detailedFeatures: **ROBUST CONSTRUCTION:** Made from heavy-duty steel, providing a stable and secure base for punching bags up to 100lbs.
**EASY ASSEMBLY:** Designed for quick and straightforward assembly, allowing you to set up your training area with minimal effort.
**SPACE-SAVING:** Freestanding design means no need to drill into walls or ceilings, making it ideal for home gyms or limited spaces.

name: Taekwondo Uniform - WTF Approved
description: WTF approved Taekwondo uniform for competition and training. Lightweight and breathable fabric for optimal performance.
detailedFeatures: **WTF APPROVED:** Officially approved by the World Taekwondo Federation for competition and training, ensuring quality and compliance.
**LIGHTWEIGHT & BREATHABLE:** Made from a lightweight and breathable fabric that allows for optimal performance and comfort during intense sessions.
**FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT:** Designed with an elastic waistband and a cut that provides excellent freedom of movement for kicks and techniques.

name: Grappling Shorts - MMA
description: MMA grappling shorts with flexible fabric and reinforced stitching. Designed for comfort and unrestricted movement during training.
detailedFeatures: **OPTIMAL FOR GRAPPLING:** Made with flexible, quick-dry fabric and high side slits for unrestricted movement during grappling and striking.

**SECURE FIT:** Equipped with a Velcro closure and an internal drawstring for a secure and customizable fit.

name: Kick Shield - Large
description: Large kick shield for powerful kicking and kneeing drills. Multi-layered foam padding with reinforced handles.
features: Large size for full power kicks
detailedFeatures: **HEAVY-DUTY IMPACT ABSORPTION:** Features thick, multi-layered foam padding designed to absorb the most powerful kicks and knees, protecting the holder.
